Name: Gladiator: about to die
About the game: Disclaimer: This game has - typical for the genre - a high difficulty and demands a lot of skill and patience. The emperor announced bread and circuses Experience the bloody business of gladiator fights from different persepectives. On the one hand manage the fate of your very own gladiator arena and on the other hand fight your way up from a simple slave to a celebrated gladiator to gain your freedom. Key - Features Which opponent do you want to fight: simple slave, glorious gladiator or vicious beast? Its your choice! After every fight you are faced with the decision wheter to let the opponent live or die! But consider the consequences for you and your dominus carefully... Fight your way to victory and freedom or fight in the arena forever Learn more about the fighting style of ancient gladiators, develop your own strategies or die trying and start anew Plant traps to make the fights even more deadlier! The audience will like this! Buy new weapons and armor and enhance your equipment Research new types of gladiators and build your own rooster of fighters Customize your own character
